english: [ bbe ] and absalom came across some of david ' s men
chinese: 押沙龙偶然遇见大卫的仆人。

english: I came across a friend in the street yesterday
chinese: 我昨天在大街上偶然遇见了一个朋友。

english: I encountered an old friend on the street yesterday
chinese: 我昨天在街上偶然遇见一位老友。

english: He happened to fall across helen that day in the street
chinese: 他那天在街上偶然遇见海伦。

english: And absalom came across some of david ' s men
chinese: 押沙龙偶然遇见大卫的仆人。
偶然遇见造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I met ( with ) one of my schoolmates at the railway station
chinese: 我在火车站偶然遇见我的一位同学。

english: I came across mrs . thompson at the supermarket today
chinese: 今天，我在超级市场偶然遇见汤普森太太。

english: And absalom met the servants of david
chinese: 9押沙龙偶然遇见大卫的仆人。

english: I came upon an old friend of mine in the street yesterday
chinese: 昨天我在街上偶然遇见我的一位老朋友。

english: I met up with him at the breakfast
chinese: 我和他在超市偶然遇见。

english: I met her by sheer chance
chinese: 我完全出于偶然遇见了她。

english: I fell across a friend of mine in the friendship department store the other day
chinese: 前几天我在友谊商店偶然遇见了我的一位朋友。

english: None acknowledges the peril , and the joy , of encountering those mental deeps hopkins described
chinese: 它们也没有肯定霍金斯所描述的偶然遇见那些思想的深度时的危险和欢乐的确存在。

english: At a reception in beijing , mr . bell , an american businessman , comes across miss wang , who is from cniec . miss wang takes the opportunity to introduce mr . liu
chinese: 在北京的一个招待会上，美国商人贝尔偶然遇见了中国进出口总公司的王小姐。王小姐借此机会把贝尔先生介绍给刘先生。
